definition: Dongshan county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian/Tungshan township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
surname Dong
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
lit. to return to office after living as a hermit on Mount Dongshan (idiom); fig. to make a comeback
Dongshan district (Uighur: Dungsen Rayoni) of Urumqi city 烏魯木齊市|乌鲁木齐市[Wu1 lu3 mu4 qi2 Shi4], Xinjiang/Dongshan district of Hegang city 鶴崗|鹤岗[He4 gang3], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: Dongshanwei on the island is the Dongshan town nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 海島上的“東山圩”就是現在的東山鎮。

sentences.english: Dongshanwei on the island is the Dongshan town nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 海島上的“東山圩”就是現在的東山鎮。

sentences.english: This is what got me fired and then hired.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼我被炒掉了能夠又東山再起。

sentences.english: He that falls today maybe up tomorrow again.
sentences.chinese: 今日跌倒的他或許他日還能東山再起。

sentences.english: I don't believe that it will be possible to put young Cowperwood on his feet after this.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信這回能夠使年輕的柯柏烏東山再起。

sentences.english: Al-Jadaa rebounded by selling her inventory and buying the equipment needed to start over.
sentences.chinese: 賈達通過變賣庫存重新購買設備才得以東山再起。

sentences.english: I went to Dongshan Park yesterday.

sentences.chinese: 東山羊是我們店的特色菜。

sentences.english: After years of semi-retirement, the actressstaged a comeback.
sentences.chinese: 那位女明星在數年的半退休之後東山再起。

sentences.english: The boss lost all his money, but soon bobbed up again.
sentences.chinese: 這老闆完全虧了本，但很快東山再起。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the necessity of transforming the product structure in Coal Washing Factory of Dongshan Coal Mine.
sentences.chinese: 論述了東山煤礦洗煤廠改變產品結構的必要性。

sentences.english: If escaping from death, need equestrian desert, in the future good stage a comeback.
sentences.chinese: 大難不死的話，就需要騎馬逃跑，日後好東山再起。

sentences.english: It is difficult for Central and Southern Europe to resurge in the short term.
sentences.chinese: 中東歐經濟短期內難以東山再起。

sentences.english: We suffered a terrible blow, but we are coming back.
sentences.chinese: 我們遭受了沉重一擊，但是我們正在東山再起。

sentences.english: The boxer hopes to stage a come-back.
sentences.chinese: 這拳擊家希望東山再起。
